channel.title: About the films category
channel.description: Short posts (with descriptive long titles) [about **movies** (following IMRS)](http://talk.cregox.com/t/rfc-cregoxs-international-movie-rating-scale/7815). Hit the `watching` button to quickly get notified of [almost everything](http://talk.cregox.com/t/about-the-buffer-category/7780) cregox is up to, rating flicks all over the world (and watch out for spoilers)! :fast_forward:
